comments:
When I try to generate the TPTP Tabular report, an error message appears and a
stack trace is sent to the log. I can generate the "Test Pass" and "Historic"
reports without problems. I am opening this bug against Test.UI.Reporting
instead of the writer of the Tabular test report generator because the stack
trace shows that
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.wizard.ReportExtensionsWizard is looking for
a key in a ResourceBundle that doesn't exist.

To work around the problem, I opened the workspace with TPTP 4.0, and the
Tabular report generated without problems.

!MESSAGE java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find resource for bundle
org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.ManifestLocalization$LocalizationResourceBundle,
key W_QUESTION
!STACK 0

Jerome,
The fix would be to add this string to the o.e.h.test.ui plugin.properties file

W_QUESTION              = Question

Added 

W_QUESTION              = Question

in plugin.properties of o.e.h.test.ui

traces.message: Can't find resource for bundle org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.ManifestLocalization$LocalizationResourceBundle, key W_QUESTION
